title: When will Imperial Lux be available again?
body:
It's been a long time since this skin was sold in the shop, I really wanted to buy it but I don't know if it's coming back!
Does anyone know if it will be ever available again?

replies.body: We don't have any dates on that skin specifically right now, but be sure to check the [**sales news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for that info!
